sense.def:
Kadar dve stvari
are linked
, je med njima povezava.

seg.quote: ...all that was known about how animal behaviour is linked to genes.
Evidence has been offered linking the group to a series of bomb attacks.

sense.def:
A link
je odnos med dvema stvarema.

seg.quote: There seems to be a link between the rising rate of unemployment and the rise in crime.
We have very close links with industry.

sense.def:
Dva kraja ali predmeta
are linked
, kadar je med njima fizična povezava, da lahko med njima potujemo ali se sporazumevamo.

seg.quote: The television camera had been linked to a computer.
...a canal linking the Pacific and Atlantic oceans.

sense.def:
A link between two places
je fizična povezava med dvema krajema.

seg.quote: They opened a rail link between the two towns.
...a telephone link between Washington and Moscow.

sense.def:
To link two things
pomeni ohlapno spojiti dve stvari.

seg.quote: She linked her hand through the crook of his elbow.

sense.def:
A link of a chain
je eden od obročkov v verigi.

To link up two items or places
pomeni povezati dva predmeta ali kraja med seboj.

seg.quote: This computer can be linked up to other computers.
